last_episode_to_air.name: Going Down
last_episode_to_air.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get trapped in an elevator with an attractive woman and do all they can to escape.

name: Beavis and Butt-head
overview: Beavis and Butt-head are high school students whose lifestyles revolve around TV, junk food (usually nachos), shopping malls, heavy metal music, and trying to "score with chicks". Each show contains short cartoons centering on the duo who live in the fictitious town of Highland, Texas. The episodes are broken up by short breaks in which Beavis and Butt-head watch and make fun of music videos.

episodes.name: Door-to-Door
episodes.overview: The boys go to door-to-door to collect money for the poor as part of a class project; they meet up with a dominatrix.

episodes.name: Give Blood
episodes.overview: Mr. Van Driessen sends the boys on a petition drive to stop a furrier from coming to town.

episodes.name: Balloon
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head buy helium balloons in order to kill dolphins at a dolphin show.

episodes.name: Scientific Stuff
episodes.overview: Daria is assigned to help the boys with their science project.

episodes.name: Good Credit
episodes.overview: The boys have Mr. Anderson's credit card, and buy $6,275 worth of animals at the pet store...which puts a damper on Anderson's Odd Fellows convention.

episodes.name: Burger World
episodes.overview: Beavis deep fries a mouse and bugs, and Butt-head serves it to Mr. Anderson as a mouse-burger and French flies.

episodes.name: Baby Makes Uh, Three
episodes.overview: Buzzcut divides the class into boy/girl pairs, and assigns each a ""sugar baby"" which they must care for and nurture for one week.  Beavis and Butt-head are paired together (as each girl in the class has refused to be assigned to them), and promptly give their "baby" a bath -- in a stream.

episodes.name: Beware of the Butt
episodes.overview: The boys incur the wrath of woman at the drive-in theatre, after taking a picture of her butt.

episodes.name: At the Sideshow
episodes.overview: The boys go to a carnival sideshow to watch Tiffany The Rubber Band Lady perform.  Somehow, they wind up in their own show, as the "Chicken-Head-Biting, Siamese twin Geeks."

episodes.name: Customers Suck
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head deal with annoying customers (and deep fry stuff) during a shift at Burger World.

episodes.name: Sick
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head go to the doctor to get prescription medicine, so they can "feel good."

episodes.name: Home Improvement
episodes.overview: Butthole and Joe paint Mr. Anderson's house. Bored with that, they sniff paint thinner, destroy quite a few things, paint his cat's butt, and decide to go for a nice ride on his lawnmower.

episodes.name: Way Down Mexico Way (1)
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head head to Mexico with their friend, Dave, in an effort to obtain illegal fireworks, but instead make a run for the bathroom after a taco stand owner gets revenge on the duo who fed his dog hot sauce.

episodes.name: Way Down Mexico Way (2)
episodes.overview: During the ride back to the U.S., Dave forces Beavis and Butthead to smuggle pills by swallowing condoms full of them â€“ but the duo forget to tie them up and the three of them end up getting pulled over by border patrol.

episodes.name: At the Movies
episodes.overview: The boys go to the drive-in theatre, causing trouble in the bathroom, the concession stand and with the security guard.

episodes.name: No Laughing (1)
episodes.overview: Principal McVicker attempts a radical solution to Beavis and Butt-head's stupidity and continuous laughing in class: they can't laugh at anything they hear for a week.

episodes.name: No Laughing (2)
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head struggle to avoid laughing during sexual education class. Problem is, Buzzcut's teaching sex education, and he's not going to make this task easy for them...

episodes.name: The Butt-Head Experience
episodes.overview: During a shift at Burger World, Butt-head goes to sleep (standing up), and dreams that he and Beavis are rock stars.

episodes.name: Lawn & Garden
episodes.overview: The boys prune Mr. Anderson's trees...and destroy his house.

episodes.name: Stewart's House
episodes.overview: The boys go over to Stewart's house to watch "Death Truck" on pay-per-view, but, bored with that, they give him a flying wedgy, vacuum the cat, sniff gas from the stove, and blow up his kitchen.

episodes.name: For Better or Verse
episodes.overview: The boys must each compose a haiku for their English class.

episodes.name: Bedpans & Broomsticks
episodes.overview: While doing community service work  at the hospital, the boys steal heart patient Billy Bob's golf cart and wreak further havoc.

episodes.name: Babes R Us
episodes.overview: Inspired by an American Gladiators episode, Beavis and Butt-head water down the front lawn, don bikini tops, and fight each other with boxing glove-topped baseball bats; they go to "Babes R Us" and try to get tickets to see female mud wrestling.  Being underage, they are beaten senseless by Thor, the bouncer.  Features the classic song, "Diarrhea, Cha Cha Cha."

episodes.name: Yogurt's Cool
episodes.overview: The boys buy frozen yogurt after seeing a seductive ad for it on TV.

episodes.name: Heroes
episodes.overview: The boys go skeet shooting and Butt-head downs a jumbo jet.

episodes.name: Sign Here
episodes.overview: Mr. Van Driessen sends the boys on a petition drive to stop a furrier from coming to town.

episodes.name: Washing the Dog
episodes.overview: The boys do a favor for Mr. Anderson (who they hope will die soon, and leave his money to them) by washing his dog Collette at the laundromat.  Of course, they wind up in one of the dryers, too.

episodes.name: Friday Night
episodes.overview: The boys head to Maxi-Mart for some Friday night action; they meet a hot biker chick with larceny on her mind.

episodes.name: Be All You Can Be
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head are almost recruited into the Army by Sergeant Dick Leaky, a.k.a. "The Rooster."

episodes.name: Comedians
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head decide to become stand-up comedians, perform at a comedy club, get booed and burn the place down.

episodes.name: Carwash
episodes.overview: Needing money to replace the batteries in their TV remote control, Beavis and Butt-head offer to wash a neighbor's vintage car. They take it for a drive to air dry it, and get into an accident with Mr. Anderson.

episodes.name: Couch-Fishing
episodes.overview: The boys reel in various things (and people) while casting from the couch, and then get Stewart in trouble with the law.

episodes.name: Incognito
episodes.overview:
After being threatened at school, Beavis and Butt-head wear disguises to class.

videos:   Run DMC - ""Down With The King""   Megadeth - ""Sweating Bullets""   Frank Black - ""Los Angeles""

This is the original airing of this episode..

episodes.name: Kidnapped
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head want to go to a concert so they try to kidnap Stewart for ransom money...but quickly get sick of him.

episodes.name: Naked Colony
episodes.overview: Without the $4,000 membership fee, Beavis and Butt-head must sneak into Sunny Grove Nudist Colony to see naked people.

episodes.name: Tornado
episodes.overview: The boys go to a trailer park during a tornado and (almost) get to ""do it"" with Lolita & Tanqueray.

episodes.name: Cleaning House
episodes.overview:
Van Driessen has Beavis and Butt-head clean his house to learn about work and money; instead they learn that 8-track tapes aren't waterproof.

videos:   Krokus - ""School's Out""   Mission UK - ""Like A Child Again""   Army Of Lovers - ""Crucified""

episodes.name: Beavis and Butt-head Meet God
episodes.overview:
After seeing hitch-hikers meet a chick on the Late, Late Movie ""Screwing Total Strangers,"" Beavis and Butt-head give it a try.  Sunburned and seeing no chicks, they get into a van and are taken to a religious cult where they meet ""God"" -- a guy named Hank who has a knack for biblical movie quotes and...chick videos.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview:
For throwing eggs at Mr. Anderson's house, Beavis and Butt-head are charged with trespassing and vandalism.  Butt-head, guided by a vision of Doug Llewelyn of "The Pupil's Court," handles their defense.  They are found guilty and sentenced to 500 hours of community service, and end up teaching other kids how to throw eggs at houses.

videos:  The Cult - ""Lil' Devil""  George Michael - ""Papa/Killer Was A Rollin' Stone""  Edie Brickell & New Bohemians - ""What I Am""

episodes.name: Canoe
episodes.overview:
The school psychiatrist requires Beavis, Butt-head and Stewart to go on a canoe trip, led by Mr. Van Driessen.  Butt-head tells Beavis that this is Mr. Van Driessen's attempt at making ""his move"" on Beavis.  A fight ensues, and the boys' canoe capsizes.  While relieving themselves in the woods (wearing only underwear), they get poison ivy.  Mr Van Driessen gets mauled by a bear.

videos:   Frank Zappa - ""You Are What You Is""   The Europeans - ""We Are Animals""   Motorhead  - ""No Voices In The Sky""   The Replacements - ""Bastards Of Young""

episodes.name: Young, Gifted & Crude

videos:   Infectious Grooves - ""Three Headed Mind Pollution""   Ethyl Meatplow - ""Devil's Johnson""   Rockwell - ""Somebody's Watching Me""

episodes.name: Foreign Exchange
episodes.overview:

episodes.name: Choke
episodes.overview:

episodes.name: Our Founding Losers

episodes.name: Beavis and Butt-head Are Dead
episodes.overview: After a three week absence from school, the principal's office calls 'the house' to learn the whereabouts of the boys...only to learn that they are dead. In the teachers' lounge at Highland High, Mr. Van Driessen wants to mourn Beavis and Butt-head by "celebrating their lives;" Principal McVicker wants to cash in on the tragedy by holding a fundraiser for the school; Buzzcut is just happy they're dead. Flashbacks a-plenty as the supporting cast recalls their fond memories of Beavis and Butt-head.

episodes.name: Werewolves of Highland
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head watch Twilight, which gives them the idea to become vampires or werewolves to look attractive in order to pick up girls.

episodes.name: Crying
episodes.overview: While eating a chili dog, Beavis sniffs a piece of onion and begins to tear up, but Butt-Head mistakes it for crying and mocks Beavis relentlessly.

episodes.name: Daughter's Hand
episodes.overview: After watching an old movie, Beavis and Butt-Head ask a man for his daughter's "hand".

episodes.name: Tech Support
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get jobs working at a computer tech support center, a position for which they are woefully under-qualified.

episodes.name: Holy Cornholio
episodes.overview: Beavis screws an action figure into his hand and has to go the hospital. At the hospital, a cult sees him as the second coming of the Messiah after he transforms into his alter ego, The Great Cornholio.

episodes.name: Drones
episodes.overview: The boys go on a field trip to a military base and wind up in the virtual pilot seats of drone planes on an Afghan mission, thinking that it is Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas with planes.

episodes.name: Supersize Me
episodes.overview: In a parody of Super Size Me, the duo makes a documentary about teenage obesity, eating fast food for 30 days straight.

episodes.name: Bathroom Break
episodes.overview: At Burger World, Butt-head realizes that he gets paid when he goes to the bathroom.

episodes.name: The Rat
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head discover that they have a rat in the house and try to catch it.

episodes.name: Spill
episodes.overview: An oil spill draws hot hippies to the shoreline.

episodes.name: Doomsday
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-head hope the apocalypse helps them score.

episodes.name: Dumb Design
episodes.overview: The boys consider religion when it gets them out of class.

episodes.name: Copy Machine
episodes.overview: Beavis struggles to refrain from copying his butt.

episodes.name: Holding
episodes.overview: The boys are mistaken for drug dealers when they visit an adult-film set.

episodes.name: Used Car
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head shanghai a used car salesman on a joyride that leaves the car in pieces.

episodes.name: Bounty Hunters
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get inspired by a Dog The Bounty Hunter look-alike.

episodes.name: Time Machine
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to erase Mr. Van Driessen's existence after falling asleep on a bus ride to a colonial village reenactment, waking up believing that they have traveled back in time to the year 1832.

episodes.name: Massage
episodes.overview: Inspired by beautiful women getting massages at the mall, Beavis and Butt-Head decide to open up their own makeshift massage shop.

episodes.name: School Test
episodes.overview: Concerned with the boys' impact on the school's public funding, Principal McVicker organizes intensive tutoring in order to help Beavis and Butt-Head prepare for the state standardized test.

episodes.name: Snitchers
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head can't handle the truth! After witnessing a brutal beating that leaves one man out cold, will the boys lie under oath to protect their idol Todd? If they screw up, there's a serious butt-kicking on the docket, Todd-style.

episodes.name: Whorehouse
episodes.overview: The duo mistake an abortion clinic for a whorehouse, and try to score with the many women there.

episodes.name: Going Down
episodes.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get trapped in an elevator with an attractive woman and do all they can to escape.
